snippet: The agreement to pay $115 million to settle accusations that it illegally colluded with its rivals to lower the prices of corporate buyouts ends a seven-year headache for the industry and brings the final tab to $590.5 million.
abstract: The agreement to pay $115 million to settle accusations that it illegally colluded with its rivals to lower the prices of corporate buyouts ends a seven-year headache for the industry and brings the final tab to $590.5 million.

headline.main: Carlyle Deal Concludes a Lawsuit Against Private Equity
